select * from (select rownum R, N.* from (select * from sponsor where
id
name
sponSort
like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sponNum > 0 order by sponNum desc) N)
where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select * from (select rownum R, N.* from ( select sponNum, sponSort, money, firstPay, sponMonth, name, id, to_char(firstPay, 'YYYY-MM') f, to_char(lastPay, 'YYYY-MM') l from sponsor) N where f <= #{search}and #{search} <= l) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select count(sponNum) from (select rownum R, N.* from ( select sponNum, sponSort, money, firstPay, sponMonth, name, id, to_char(firstPay, 'YYYY-MM') f, to_char(lastPay, 'YYYY-MM') l from sponsor) N where f <= #{search}and #{search} <= l)
select sum(money) from ( select money, to_char(firstPay, 'YYYY-MM') f, to_char(lastPay, 'YYYY-MM') l from sponsor) where f <= #{search}and #{search} <= l

select count(sponNum) from sponsor where
id
name
sponSort
like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sponNum > 0

select sum(totalMoney) from sponsor where
id
name
sponSort
like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sponNum > 0
